## MediaDeviceSwitchOffInfo type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type MediaDeviceSwitchOffInfo = {
    kind: MediaKind;
    device: MediaInputDeviceInfo;
};
```
**References:** [MediaKind](./rtckit.mediakind.md)<!-- -->, [MediaInputDeviceInfo](./rtckit.mediainputdeviceinfo.md)

## Remarks

- `kind` - media input kind of the device

- `device` - disconnected media input device info
